text: The Umpqua Community College shooting was a mass shooting that happened at Umpqua Community College in Roseburg, Oregon, United States on October 1, 2015. The shooter, 26-year-old Christopher Harper-Mercer, shot and murdered 9 people before taking his own. The shooting is the deadliest school shooting in Oregon history. == References == Category:2010s mass shootings in the United States Category:2015 mass shootings Category:University and college shootings in the United States Category:21st century in Oregon
title: 2015 Umpqua Community College shooting
